name: Dean Taylor
description:
Dean Taylor ( Â– Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Dean Taylor in mp3 format. Dean Taylor is the general editor of The Remnant of the Charity church movement. He has written a powerful book on non-resistance: A Change of Allegiance. His teachings on suffering and martyrdom are important for the body of Christ and we must learn again from our forefathers and how they suffered for Christ.
"Every day IÂ’m more convinced that the only thing worth putting my life into is the simple, child-like acceptance of the teachings of Jesus. I believe that Jesus meant what He said. But even more, I believe that JesusÂ’ plan for humanity is actually a great idea! Sometimes the ways and wisdom of Jesus donÂ’t make sense." - Dean Taylor

sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Chosen Generation
sermons.description: God has always desired to have a precious, peculiar people unto Himself. We can be a joy and treasure to God. He has promised that if we will come out from among the world and separate ourselves unto Him, He will be a father unto us, and we His sons and daughters.
sermons.preacher_description:

But even more, I believe that JesusÂ’ plan for humanity is actually a great idea! Sometimes the ways and wisdom of Jesus donÂ’t make sense." - Dean Taylor

sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Holy Nation
sermons.description: Are you a patriot? Are you willing to give your life for your nation? Which one? Really, there's only two choices. God's holy nation, made up of the followers of King Jesus, and the kingdom of this world.

sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Purchased Possession
sermons.description: There is something about this holy Kingdom of God that sets it so far apart from any religion, so much higher than an empty set of dry doctrines. The King loves you! The King loves you and is jealous of your love and affection. Behold, what manner of love is this!

sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Royal Priesthood
sermons.description: What does it really mean to be priests unto God? What is expected, and what are the blessed privileges? Find out more as Brother Dean shares about this powerful metaphor that should affect every area of our lives.

sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Holy
sermons.description: We need a clear understanding of the holiness of God. God is holy, and He must be the standard by which we measure our lives. Because of Who God is, He desires us to be a holy people unto Himself, separate and set apart to God.

sermons.title: Biblical Nonresistance
sermons.description: Dean Taylor speaks on the biblical subject of non-violence following in the spirit of Christ and His teaching. Hear again some of the wonderful commands of Christ from Scriptures. He gives encouragements on becoming a soldier of the Lord to follow Christ passionately.
